analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#312-317) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#315-317)

GrapevineCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#854-868) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-authorisedInvestors.handleOffchainWhitelisted(_beneficiary,_whitelistSign) (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#866-867)

Reentrancy in GrapevineCrowdsale._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#888-906):
	External calls:
	- _bonus = getBonus(block.timestamp,_beneficiary,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#889-890)
	- _currentBalance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#894)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#904-906)
	- bonuses (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#898-900)
	- tokensToBeDelivered (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#902-904)

Reentrancy in GrapevineCrowdsale.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#869-879):
	External calls:
	- super.withdrawTokens() (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#873)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonuses (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#874-876)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#394-402) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#397-398)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#408-418) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#413-418)

GrapevineCrowdsale._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#888-906) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _bonus > 0 (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#890-901)
	- require(bool)(_currentBalance >= _totalTokens.add(_bonusTokens)) (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#894-895)

GrapevineCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- remainingTokens > 0 (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol)

GrapevineCrowdsale.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#869-879) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > deliveryTime) (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#872-873)

GrapevineCrowdsale.getBonus (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#937-951) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _time < openingTime.add(1814400) (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#947-950)
	- _time < openingTime.add(1209600) (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#945-950)
	- _time < openingTime.add(604800) (/unique_chucks/25/0x570a0529e3f06b1768bb8fecff2239bde584ee38.sol#944-950)
